channel.title: Help me to add music!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im really stuck!! Im following this guide
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=11228
To add music to my client, but i don't have a gui.java! Please can you give me one with all that stuff in!!
Regards ~Johno [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] Seriously how many topics have you made for this? 4-5? [/center]

item.title: Help me to add music!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:5, topic:270162”]Ffs, i no java, im creating a good server atm, just all my voids are problly wrong and theres prob 2 many { or }

Just all anoying…[/quote]

No, you don’t know java.

Here’s a good place to start. http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/getStarted/index.html

Read full topic

item.description:

johno2:

I no, but if you read the silabsoft TuT’s post, i need lots more!! I tryed adding it all, just came out with 50+ errors!!!

Add it yourslef and Learn Java

item.title: Help me to add music!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:270162”]class Gui { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("IIRC I have already told you this"); } }

c+p the rest[/quote]

I no, but if you read the silabsoft TuT’s post, i need lots more!! I tryed adding it all, just came out with 50+ errors!!!
